about_the_game:
Potion Tales is a narrative-driven Potion Brewing game in which you brew magical potions for your customers to solve their unique problems.

Each customer has unique needs and requests, and it's up to you to choose a fitting potion using your brewing skills and ingredients at hand.

But be warned - every decision you make will significantly impact the outcome, and your customers' fate is in your hands!

Meet your customers


• Listen to the unique problems and stories of various inhabitants in a colorful fantasy world.

•Meet intriguing characters such as grave tender with plans to fill vacant graves, a fire spirit training to become a water mage and a man striving to become a god.

• Use your brewing skills to make potions that will determine the fate of these characters and their stories.

Brew a variety of magical potions


• Use almost 30 different ingredients at your disposal to brew 20 unique potions.

• Discover potions recipes and an ingredients index in your trusty potion book.

• Carefully follow recipes and prepare your ingredients by cutting, crushing, or liquefying them.

• Ensure each ingredient is added to the cauldron in the correct order to brew the perfect potion.

Make yourself at home


• Enjoy a colourful, Low-poly Art-Syle

• Arrange your workspace to your liking

• Immerse yourself in the atmospheric sounds of the potion kitchen while listening to a cozy soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Anything from this or the last decade
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Anything from this or the last decade
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any internal sound card will do
  • Additional Notes: This is a really lightweight game, we'd be suprised if you had any performance issues.

short_description: Potion Tales is a potion brewing game, in which the potions you create decide the fate of your customers. Make yourself at home in a cozy potion kitchen and prepare different potions for the unique problems of your customers.
